body_html: This happens because the eager placer is a little too aggressive about putting your variable on the GPU if one is available. Place it on the cpu by putting a with tf.device('cpu:0'): around the variable declaration.
body_text: This happens because the eager placer is a little too aggressive about putting your variable on the GPU if one is available. Place it on the cpu by putting a with tf.device('cpu:0'): around the variable declaration.
body: This happens because the eager placer is a little too aggressive about putting your variable on the GPU if one is available. Place it on the cpu by putting a `with tf.device('cpu:0'):` around the variable declaration.
